metadata.title: CVE-2017-11661 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - low
metadata.description:
The _WM_SetupMidiEvent function in internal_midi.c:2318 in WildMIDI 0.4.2can cause a denial of service (invalid memory read and application crash)via a crafted mid file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11661` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwildmidi-config - 0.4.2-1
libwildmidi2 - 0.4.2-1
wildmidi - 0.4.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wildmidi package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.4.2-1').
